Sections.Text: Bosch manor's master is finally at rest, along with the spirits he'd enslaved
Although the Tyree's paid a terrible price, the day is there's, along with the monstrous old man's many secrets.
Bosch foresaw his own demise, and had already begun preparations for his immoratality. In the basement below he'd started to construct an artificial body, something wholly unnatural and terrifying.
But the Tyrees did not come to this house seeking such dark secrets. Today they have rid the world of evil, and that should be enough.
That should be enough. It really should. But sometimes its hard to resist the temptations of buried secrets, no matter how terrible they might be.
